paragraphs.p1: I am an app developer, specialized in web and mobile devices. Throughout my career I have worked on projects for companies such as Atos, Talgo or Aena.
paragraphs.p2: Software development, apart from my job, is my passion and that is why I never stop learning new technologies and tools to keep up with the latest news of this world.
